AzureBlade: I've got an assignment to do inside before I help you.
It's not a bomb, but it does no more good than one. I'll join you
afterwards.

He skimmed low, just above the murky waters of the swamp and went
behind the base. Using his entry code, he entered the shields and
slipped inside by a battered airlock.

This was going to be good.
